requirement_tested: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A new investor looking to explore stock information quickly.
user_goal: To find and view details for a specific stock by entering its name or code.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and sees the search bar at the top. She wants to look up Apple Inc.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar becomes focused and ready for text input.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Name
narrative_steps.description: Sarah types 'Apple' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Apple' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Text appears in the search bar with navy color on a white background.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search Query
narrative_steps.description: After typing, Sarah presses Enter to start the search.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter key.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system processes the query and navigates to the results or stock detail page.

requirement_tested: Provide auto-suggested stock matches during search input
user_persona: A frequent trader who knows stock symbols but wants quick confirmation.
user_goal: To efficiently select a known stock from auto-suggested options while typing.

narrative_steps.title: Typing Partial Symbol
narrative_steps.description: Mike starts typing 'TSLA' in the search bar.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'TSLA' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown list of matching stocks appears below the search bar.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Suggestions
narrative_steps.description: Mike notices Tesla Inc. (TSLA) listed in the suggestions.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the dropdown list items.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each suggestion shows both company name and ticker symbol with navy text on white background.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggestion
narrative_steps.description: Mike clicks on 'Tesla Inc. (TSLA)' from the list.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the suggested item.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar is populated with 'TSLA' and the dropdown disappears.

requirement_tested: Display basic stock information including company details and current price
user_persona: A casual investor checking key facts before making a decision.
user_goal: To quickly verify the current price and core details of a stock.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Stock
narrative_steps.description: Emily searches for 'Microsoft' and submits the query.
narrative_steps.action: Enter 'Microsoft' and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system loads the Microsoft stock profile page.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Company Info
narrative_steps.description: Emily looks at the top section to confirm company name, sector, and current price.
narrative_steps.action: Scan the displayed card with basic stock information.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A card displays Microsoft Corp., technology sector, and the latest stock price in navy text on white background.

requirement_tested: Show market trend visualizations such as charts and graphs
user_persona: A technical analyst interested in recent price movement patterns.
user_goal: To analyze short-term price trends using interactive charts.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Market Trends Section
narrative_steps.description: David has searched for Amazon and scrolls down to the market trends section.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the market trend visualization area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A line chart showing Amazon's closing prices over time is visible.

narrative_steps.title: Changing Time Frame
narrative_steps.description: David wants to see a broader view and selects the 3-month option.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the '3M' button beneath the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart updates to show three months of price data.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Data Points
narrative_steps.description: David hovers over a peak point to get exact value and date.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a data point on the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears showing the precise price and timestamp.

requirement_tested: Present financial data including revenue, earnings, and key ratios
user_persona: A fundamental analyst evaluating financial health.
user_goal: To compare yearly financial performance metrics side-by-side.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Financials Tab
narrative_steps.description: Priya searches for Google and finds the financial data section.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the financial data table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tabular view of fiscal years and financial metrics is shown.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting by Revenue
narrative_steps.description: Priya wants to sort the data by revenue to identify growth trends.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Revenue' column header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The table reorders rows descending by revenue values.

requirement_tested: Enable users to select from multiple report format options
user_persona: A manager preparing documentation for stakeholders.
user_goal: To generate a report in a preferred file format suitable for sharing.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Report Format
narrative_steps.description: John needs a formal document and prefers PDF format for his stock report.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'PDF' radio button in the format selection area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'PDF' option is visually highlighted with navy outline.

requirement_tested: Allow users to customize report content sections and depth
user_persona: An experienced investor wanting only relevant parts in their report.
user_goal: To tailor the report to include only sections of personal interest.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Customization Panel
narrative_steps.description: Maria clicks to expand the report customization controls.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the expand control for the customization panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Checkboxes for different report sections become visible.

narrative_steps.title: Excluding Unneeded Sections
narrative_steps.description: Maria unchecks 'Dividend Information' since she doesn't care about payouts.
narrative_steps.action: Uncheck the 'Dividend Information' checkbox.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The unchecked box reflects deselected status and excludes that section from the report.

requirement_tested: Generate downloadable stock reports in selected formats
user_persona: A portfolio manager needing to archive detailed stock analyses.
user_goal: To save a fully customized stock report locally for future reference.

narrative_steps.title: Finalizing Report Settings
narrative_steps.description: Robert has configured his desired format and content selections.
narrative_steps.action: Review selected format and customizations.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All settings reflect Robert's choices accurately.

narrative_steps.title: Generating and Downloading Report
narrative_steps.description: Ready to obtain the report, Robert clicks the download button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Download Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A browser-native download prompt appears offering the compiled report file.

requirement_tested: Include a summary section highlighting key stock insights
user_persona: A busy executive requiring a snapshot of critical stock factors.
user_goal: To quickly grasp major takeaways without reading entire reports.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Summary Highlights
narrative_steps.description: Lisa searches for Netflix and immediately scans the summary box.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the key insights summary section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Bullet points summarizing valuation, performance, and risks are clearly presented.

user_persona: A long-term investor assessing decade-long performance.
user_goal: To evaluate how a stock has performed historically over several years.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Long-Term Chart
narrative_steps.description: Alan wants to see five years of Coca-Cola stock performance.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the '5Y' timeframe selector in the historical chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart redraws to show five years of price history.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Specific Values
narrative_steps.description: Alan moves his cursor along the chart to inspect past values.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over various points on the historical chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltip displays accurate price and date for hovered positions.

user_persona: A novice investor relying on expert opinions for guidance.
user_goal: To understand collective professional sentiment towards a stock.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Analyst Opinions
narrative_steps.description: Sophie checks the analyst ratings section after searching for Disney.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the analyst ratings display.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of analyst firms with recommendations and a distribution chart appear.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Individual Ratings
narrative_steps.description: Curious about Goldman Sachs' stance, Sophie clicks on their entry.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an individual analyst rating row.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Additional commentary or source links related to that rating expand.

requirement_tested: Show dividend information and payout history
user_persona: An income-focused retiree tracking regular dividend payments.
user_goal: To review consistency and amount of past dividend distributions.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Dividend Timeline
narrative_steps.description: George scrolls to the dividend section for Johnson & Johnson.
narrative_steps.action: View the dividend timeline visualization.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Past dividend events with dates and amounts are displayed chronologically.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Detailed Event Info
narrative_steps.description: George clicks on a specific dividend event to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a past dividend marker on the timeline.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Details like declaration date or payout frequency notes appear.

requirement_tested: Present comparative analysis against industry benchmarks
user_persona: A competitive strategist analyzing relative market position.
user_goal: To benchmark a company's performance against industry standards.

narrative_steps.title: Comparing Metrics Side-by-Side
narrative_steps.description: Nancy views the comparison section for Exxon Mobil vs. oil sector averages.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the industry comparison table or chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Differences between Exxon's metrics and industry benchmarks are clearly shown.

narrative_steps.title: Understanding Metric Significance
narrative_steps.description: Nancy hovers over P/E Ratio to better understand what it indicates.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the 'P/E Ratio' label in the comparison table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A brief explanation of the metric pops up explaining its relevance.

user_persona: A day trader monitoring live price fluctuations.
user_goal: To track instantaneous changes in stock pricing without refreshing.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Live Updates
narrative_steps.description: Jake watches Intel's price change as he waits for breaking news.
narrative_steps.action: Watch the current price display and chart update automatically.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Current price and chart adjust in real-time with a green live indicator present.

requirement_tested: Maintain consistent styling with white background and navy component colors
user_persona: A UX designer reviewing design consistency across features.
user_goal: To ensure all UI components maintain a unified color scheme.

narrative_steps.title: Evaluating Visual Consistency
narrative_steps.description: Taylor inspects various sections of the site to check for uniform styling.
narrative_steps.action: Browse through different pages and modules.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every component uses white backgrounds with navy borders, icons, and text consistently.
